articles.author: Harish Jonnalagadda
articles.title: OnePlus Nord has a Snapdragon 765G and 'flagship-level' camera for €500 - Android Central
articles.description: OnePlus co-founder Carl Pei has confirmed that the OnePlus Nord is powered by a Snapdragon 765G chipset. The phone will offer a 'flagship-level' camera, and will be available for €500 once it goes on sale later this month.
